website_summaries.verdict: Classic old-school formula for the ultimate relaxing pre-shave treatment. Outstanding scent and cool to the skin.
pros: Traditional men's shaving cream with special application for sensitive skin
Comes in a convenient travel size
cons: Takes longer and requires more work to lather

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive images falsely portray the size of this - buyer ...
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive images falsely portray the size of this - buyer beware that this is not the normal sized product (which is also on Amazon for the same price).
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: ITS ONLY 2oz!!!! THATS $8.00 an ounce!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for not reading the details, and shame on the seller for pushing this packaging @ that price. $8.00 AN OUNCE!!!! I have used Taylor shaving creams for years. Being in the service they are great for field use and traveling. This is the first time I have been shorted on my purchase. 👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: RIPOFF - Travel Size at Full Price
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, this is only 2oz at an even higher price than the 5.3oz bowl. Technically the listed item is correct, but it's an easy mistake to make if you're not paying attention. Either way, the price is terrible. Buy this wonderful soap from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Don Adams

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. It has a fantastic fragrance and you only ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It has a fantastic fragrance and you only need a tiny amount to cover your entire face. I also have no irritation bumps since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: Hmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Small container price like large container beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this it’s the small container for the price of a large container and a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Ecarp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of this shaving cream and I was extremely happy to find they had a travel size version. This was a life saver on a recent month long trip, the size is perfect and you can achieve a very satisfying lather with a small amount of cream. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gomez

customer_reviews.title: like other sensitive skin soaps (Proraso)
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive, and 60 grams looks a lot larger in the pictures. It does not irritate my skin, and does not have an overpowering fragrance, like other sensitive skin soaps (Proraso). It came dry as a bone, so I had to put a little water in it, mix it up to make a cream that I assume is supposed to be the right consistency.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes the shave go a lot smoother. I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleGun

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. Lathers up well with a brush. Love it
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Beware: This is the Travel Size Item, for Full Price
customer_reviews.text: The item pictured is the full-size container, but read the fine print: The item sold is a much smaller travel-size container, still sold at full price. This is a sham; I like the product just fine, but I'm returning it due to the deceptive illustration.
customer_reviews.author: David Newman

customer_reviews.title: Another old Bond. Great
customer_reviews.text: I found that all old bonds lather very well and protect your skin. The scent is one of my favorites
customer_reviews.author: chris bedetto

customer_reviews.title: Product completely dried out
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with lose cap and completely dried out. Looks like very old stock. This was the replacement product. The original was also totally dried out and looked like it had been opened before.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel product
customer_reviews.text: Received just as advertised. I bought this smaller size product for travel and it fits the bill perfectly. Love the scent and lathers well.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Travel size for full size price.
customer_reviews.text: Travel sized that's pictured to appear like the normal size and uses the weight instead of the ounces to appear larger. Buy the normal size for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very manly scent, this product creates a great lather....nice and slick for a great shave.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving cream but small packaging
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but packaging has gotten smaller and price the same.
customer_reviews.author: Fid from Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, smaller than expected, buy the full container for similar price
customer_reviews.text: This item is priced almost the same as what other sellers ask for the full container of shaving cream. This container has maybe a third of that amount. Deceptive pricing and wording, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Travel size product - not full size
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I was in a hurry to purchase and did not read the item description closely. This is actually the travel size of the product that is deceptively priced the same as the full size.
customer_reviews.author: Read size closely

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Other reviews are correct. Travel ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Other reviews are correct. Travel size of 2.03 ounce, for price of full size 5.3 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Khun John

customer_reviews.title: Product was completely dried out. Jermyn street is my ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was completely dried out. Jermyn street is my constant and this was more of a shave soap than a crème.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item is priced similarly to the much larger size. Buy that instead. 60g is tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cohen

customer_reviews.title: This is a “travel sized” tub, not the 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a “travel sized” tub, not the 5 oz. standard sized tub. The cost of a 5 oz. tub is about 15 dollars typically. This is a collasal rip off and I suspect the seller is counting on us not knowing that it is a travel size. Rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: Great shaving cream, but DON'T BUY THIS SIZE. I ordered the cream in the past and bought a 5.3.ounce container for $16. I wasn't paying attention to detail and I just received my $14 mini container with only 2.03 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Doin

customer_reviews.title: Check size!!! Buy the bigger size for same price
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, great shave. Just beware, its small. Imagine make u think its the size of their other products. Once received I realized that if for $3 more could get 2x the size. Low stars for the deceit.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Liar, liar....
customer_reviews.text: Add another tally to the photos being deceptively small. These "puck" containers are barely an inch deep. I can't understand why General King continues to do this to Amazon customers. The product, of course, is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Castania

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is all I use with my double edge safety razor. I have very sensitive skin and this is the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Read the description carefully
customer_reviews.text: Watch Out! I ordered this without realizing how very small this container is. I like the cream, but my fault for not noticing the size difference. Too expensive for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Kind Reader

customer_reviews.title: Too much for too little
customer_reviews.text: Way to expensive for this tiny bit of shaving cream. Would never buy again. Good product, way over priced. Still just shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: kodey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Was buying it from a local shop ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Was buying it from a local shop until they stopped supplying it. Good to know its available here. Showed up on time and per the description. I have skin that easily gets irritated during shaving, this product is fantastic to help in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its always been my favorite. Smell is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for a long time. Its always been my favorite. Smell is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: David Walik

customer_reviews.title: ripoff
customer_reviews.text: this item is 60 ml. you can get a 5.3 oz size for a couple dollars more. don't buy from this seller
customer_reviews.author: John wojciak

customer_reviews.title: Like the man said way too expensive for 60 ml
customer_reviews.text: Small, Cute container, reason for any stars. Like the man said way too expensive for 60 ml. Can buy 100 ml for a dollar less
customer_reviews.author: dwLost
